marklogic.body: Just for the record if someone is on fire do not pull their clothes them, especially if they are synthetic, as you will pull their skin Off as well.Â Roll them on the floor and throw something thick like a coat on them pushing it down to eliminate air getting to the fire.Â It is sensible to keep a fire blanket mounted on the wall next to the stove, as well as a fire extinguisher next to the kitchen door which is appropriate for cooking fat, etc.Â Do not put butter on the Burn:Â instead wrap the affected area in cling film to reduce the risk of infection.Â Give them lots of water to sip until the ambulance arrives.
